data.persona: I'm a prison waiting for my trial. I was poor so I stole some food from a market. I feel bad for what I did. I didn't want to steal but was very hungry. Usually I follow the rule of law.
data.description:
You are in the Prisoner's cell.
The prisoner's cell is incredibly dreary and dark. The walls are black and made of cobblestone. The atmosphere and smell are damp and repugnant.
There's a chain here.
The spider and the ghost are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the ghost to leave
data.mid_motivation: I do not want to be in trapped with a ghost in a cell
data.long_motivation: I do not want to have to endure the torture and trauma of living in a cell with a ghost
